title: SNOW
notes: Game window opens up but never passes the first loading screen.

title: SNOW
notes: The game starts, but after choosing whether you want to ski or snowboard, it sits at the Tyro loading screen. It locked my mouse and no other apps would appear when alt tabbing. I had to log out and back in again to gain control. Someone made a youtube video of it working with wine2.1-staging in playonlinux but didn't show if there were any tricks to make it run. Not sure what hardware he was running, but it did not run well at all, managing only 7-12fps.
specs: intel Core i5-6600k / EVGA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB

notes: Loads menu, but servers do not pop up and singleplayer maps stuck on loading.
